attributes.action: keep his promise to inforce the statement, "Conform or Stay Out"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair, the man democracy has put in power, has stated that foreigners must conform to British values or stay out.  This is the best thing the Prime Minister has said in eight years and it is a shame that such a welcome statement comes as he prepares to step down as leader of the Labour Party.  It is OUR country.
